column4: if you have a digital audio cable going from the cd drive to a soundcard you shouldnt need to mount, right? the cd player should play the music without the Os needing to do anything? someone smack me if I'm wrong I'm just taking a leap of screwy logic
does the drive wind up ? does a earphone get sound ?
wasnt my problem, I dunno. was just throwing out a thought on someone elses trouble
so no sure answer is possible: if the ide-cable is attached, it depends on the config on that machine , if ubu 'blocks' manual access, else it should work, but why would you do that ?
